ValidationRule.description: This validation rule prevents a lead from being converted if the student's application is not completed (i.e. Application field is checked).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE,
left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Lead_TraditionalEnrollment , 15),
IsConverted = TRUE,
ISBLANK( Associated_Application__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The student's application must be submitted in full prior to converting a lead.
